articles.title: This is the severance package Starbucks offered to laid-off staff at the stores it's closing - Business Insider
articles.description: The chain is closing about 1% of its stores in North America — more than 100 locations.
articles.content:
Starbucks presented its laid-off baristas with a severance package less than a week after it announced sweeping layoffs and store closures.

articles.title: American Fish Company closes indefinitely following mass shooting - WECT
articles.description: This announcement comes after Southport Police announced the arrest of Nigel Edge in connection with the deadly shooting.
articles.content:
SOUTHPORT, N.C. (WECT) - The bar at the center of a mass shooting in Southport is closing indefinitely, according to a Facebook post.
